name: steam
description: Posts the link as web and steam urls, steam workshop and store are supported

description_localizations.en-GB: Posts the link as web and steam urls, steam workshop and store are supported
description_localizations.en-US: Posts the link as web and steam urls, steam workshop and store are supported
description_localizations.de: Veröffentlicht den Link als Web- und Steam-URLs, Steam Workshop und Store werden unterstützt
description_localizations.fr: Publie le lien sous forme d'URL Web et Steam, l'atelier et le magasin sont pris en charge
description_localizations.es-ES: Publica el enlace como URL web y de Steam, el taller de Steam y la tienda de Steam son compatibles
description_localizations.it: Pubblica il link come URL web e Steam, l'officina Steam e il negozio Steam sono supportati
description_localizations.pt-BR: Publica o link como URLs da web e do Steam, o workshop Steam e a loja Steam são suportados
description_localizations.ru: Публикует ссылку как веб- и URL-адреса Steam, мастерская Steam и магазин Steam поддерживаются
description_localizations.ja: リンクをWebとSteam URLとして投稿し、Steamワークショップとストアをサポートします
description_localizations.ko: 링크를 웹 및 스팀 URL로 게시하고 스팀 워크샵 및 스토어를 지원합니다
description_localizations.zh-CN: 将链接发布为Web和Steam URL，支持Steam工坊和Steam商店
description_localizations.zh-TW: 將連結發布為Web和Steam URL，支援Steam工坊和Steam商店

options.name: url
options.description: Url in the steam:// or https:// format, steam workshop and steam store are supported

description_localizations.en-GB: Url in the steam:// or https:// format, steam workshop and steam store are supported
description_localizations.en-US: Url in the steam:// or https:// format, steam workshop and steam store are supported
description_localizations.de: URL im Format steam:// oder https://, Steam Workshop und Steam Store werden unterstützt
description_localizations.fr: URL au format steam:// ou https://, l'atelier Steam et le magasin Steam sont pris en charge
description_localizations.es-ES: URL en el formato steam:// o https://, el taller de Steam y la tienda de Steam son compatibles
description_localizations.it: URL nel formato steam:// o https://, l'officina Steam e il negozio Steam sono supportati
description_localizations.pt-BR: URL no formato steam:// ou https://, o workshop Steam e a loja Steam são suportados
description_localizations.ru: URL в формате steam:// или https://, мастерская Steam и магазин Steam поддерживаются
description_localizations.ja: steam://またはhttps://形式のURL、SteamワークショップとSteamストアがサポートされています
description_localizations.ko: steam:// 또는 https:// 형식의 URL, 스팀 워크샵 및 스팀 스토어를 지원합니다
description_localizations.zh-CN: 以steam://或https://格式的URL，支持Steam工坊和Steam商店
description_localizations.zh-TW: 以steam://或https://格式的URL，支援Steam工坊和Steam商店
